title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Emission
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Emission 

Allocation) Regulations 2023.

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of
heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations – 

“Decision” means Decision No. 406/2009/EC of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 23 April 20091 on the effort of Member States to 
reduce their greenhouse gas emissions to meet the Community’s greenhouse 
gas emission reduction commitments up to 2020; 

“Minister” means 
Communications. 

the Minister for 

the Environment, Climate and 

(2) A word or expression that is used in these Regulations and is also used 
in the Decision has, unless the context otherwise requires, the same meaning in 
these Regulations as it has in the Decision.
text_norm: 2 (1) regulation - decision mean decision no 406 2009 ec european parliament council 23 april 20091 effort member state reduce greenhouse gas emission meet community greenhouse gas emission reduction commitment 2020 minister mean communication minister environment climate (2) word expression used regulation also used decision unless context otherwise requires meaning regulation decision

title: European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of
heading: 3. (1) For the purpose of ensuring compliance with the State’s obligations
text_raw:
3. (1) For the purpose of ensuring compliance with the State’s obligations 
under Article 3 of the Decision and in accordance with paragraph (5) of that 
Article, the Minister may arrange for the purchase from another Member State 
of that Member State’s surplus annual emission allocation and the Minister 
may take any other such steps as are necessary for that purpose. 

(2) The costs and expenses incurred by the Minister in the performance of 
his or her functions under paragraph (1) shall, to such extent as may be 
sanctioned by the Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan 
Delivery and Reform, be paid out of monies provided by the Oireachtas. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 March, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications. 

1 OJ No. L140, 05.06.2009, p.136 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th March, 2023.
